name: Mid-Pacific Research Laboratory
tagline: A planned self-sustaining floating research city.
body:
# The Mid-Pacific Research Laboratory [A researchlaboratory project](http://researchlaboratory.science) ## Physics, Chemistry, Engineering, Biology, we've got it all. The Mid-Pacific Research Laboratory is a general-purpose research laboratory for just about any subject, from Physics to Biology to Electrical Engineering to Astronomy to *(gasp)* Oceanography. ## We're in the middle of the Pacific. There's nothing bothering you here. Every single building has an ocean view. ## Did I mention autonomous? There's almost no manual labor in this city. Everything is autonomous, including the Factory. ## That factory... what is it? If there's something you need made, create a Factory Definition File (.FDF file) and send it off to the autonomous factory. Within a day, whatever you had made will be sent directly to your room, at no cost. ## Self-sustaining. Really. We have many eco-friendly mostly autonomous utility buildings that provide everything a research station in the middle of the ocean needs. - Hydro-atomic power - Desalination plant (Salt water to fresh water) - Non-autonomous fishing building (with rod lending!) - The Factory - Farm (where machines tend to plants and people tend to animals) - Autonomous mine ## Price You can get this all for the low, low price of **$0**. That's right. Every single perk of this research laboratory for free. Want to build an airplane (or something equally as large)? Free. Want to create a new species? Free. Want to create another [seasteading](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seasteading "Wikipedia") research laboratory? We'll lend you our boats to help. Everything in this laboratory is free, and we have no expenses (as we are self-sustaining). # Funding Okay, we'll admit: this isn't a thing. Yet. We are in need of funding to get this lab off the ground. There's not an IndieGoGo or Kickstarter, we're just using good ole' cryptocurrencies and PayPal. - Bitcoin: `1NkAXMEK5m3MnTvJsRUdZTgvN8vdYTCh9W` - Litecoin: `LR92td5bWgQrUNMdYaN8FKfyYA17syXDur` -
# Contact Us Want to talk to us about something? Pop us an email at [mid-pacific@researchlaboratory.science](mailto:mid-pacific@researchlaboratory.science).
